Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms & helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Cata M
Reviews.Content: In a superb location. In their range, rooms were confortable, with all facilities you may need for a short stay. And it is really clean. I have been for 4 days. Managed by a family who own the place for a long time now. These people were very helpful to have my arrangements to airport and city visits done.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to be...”
Reviews.Author: rinss
Reviews.Content: I love this place , hostel is situated in a heart of Madrid, very close to metro. Rooms very clean, staff very friendly and helpful.Cheap , very nice atmosphere.I will be back there...

Reviews.Title: “Shady Staff, Poor Location”
Reviews.Author: AnuM2011
Reviews.Content: If you're trying to travel on a budget, this place could work. However, the hostal is located on Gran Via, one of the most crowded and busy streets in the entire city of Madrid and the room that we were put in faced the road. Impossible to sleep. The entrance to the building is poorly kept and creepy. The staff member that greeted us was rude, unfriendly and also unhelpful. The towels in the bathroom were rough and almost unusable. The blankets and the pillow in my bed had hair on them and the blanket that they use as a cover was one of the filthiest blankets I've ever seen.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, clean and central - the three essential "c"s.”
Reviews.Author: Travelibrarian
Reviews.Content: Staff were really helpful. Good location - easy to find on one of the major streets. Windows had really good soundproofing so the street noise was no problem. Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “A driller behind the window”
Reviews.Author: Susurs
Reviews.Content: Before choosing this hostal, MAKE SURE you find out weather the construction works in the nearby building are finished. As we arrived in this otherwise nice hostal in Madrid centre, a huge noise expected us because of the drilling works in the nearby building. Ok, you don't come to Madrid to sit in a room, and we were promised that the works are not done in the evening and night and are renewed 9 a.m. (which was ok with us, as we planned an early leave). But the saddest thing was that the receptionist lied to us. The works were renewed not 9, but 8 a.m., so we were woken up by a TERRIBLE NOISE and, opening the window, it turned out that the driller was almost BEHIND it! So do not take this hostal, if you like a good sleep, plan to stay in room during daytime or don't like lying people. But otherwise, as I mentioned, both room and bathroom was nice and clean.
